readable.title: 3188036349_8e4e2d6ca8
readable.content: a child in a blue shirt exits is being deposited from a slide onto a sand in front of palm trees . A kid is coming out of a tube slide and is about to hit the sand . A small child coming out of a covered slide . A young blonde child shoots from a slide at high speed . A young boy about to land in the sand from a trip down a beige slide .
